name: Animal In The Wood
description:
STORY

Animal in the Wood - is a short 3D first person horror game. Your best friend went to the forest for mushrooms and never returned home. You went in search of him. 

Will you find your friend in the forest?

CONTROLS

W/A/S/D - walk.
F - flashlight.
J - journal.
LMB - interact.
Left Shift - sprint.
Tab - inventory.
ESC - game menu.

NOTE Youtube
Patreon

If you liked the game consider leaving a review and a comment.
